#=================================================================
# BEGINNING OF THE SETTINGS
#=================================================================
CREATE_REPORT="0"     ## If 1, create a HTML report
NBTHREADS="4"     ## Set the number of threads to use for the multi-threaded tools
SKIP_DIFFUSION_MOCORR="0"     ## Set this value to 1 to skip the motion correction for DWI.
SKIP_ICC_EXTRACTION="0"     ## Skip the ICC extraction. An ICC composed of all the non-null voxels will be created.
POPULATION_ALIGNMENT_STRATEGY="0"     ## 0: Slow version / 1: Composed registration (faster)
POPULATION_ALIGNMENT_ALGORITHM="0"     ## 0: CRL Block Matching / 1: ANTs
PARCELLATION_STRATEGY="1"     ## 0: Local MAP STAPLE / 1: Local Probabilistic MAP STAPLE
ICC_STRATEGY="0"     ## 0: Label based, without intensity (best) / 1: Label and intensity based
ICC_BABY="0"     ## 0: Patients age 3 years or older / 1: Patient age under 3 years old
ICC_VESSELS="0"     ## 0: No Vessel segmentation (best) / 1: Vessel segmentation (Experimental)
NEW_ICC_EXTRACTION="0"     ## Use intensity based ICC extraction 0:NOT, label based / 1:YES, intensity based
ALIGN_ANAT_TO_DIFF="0"     ## Align the anatomical scan onto the DWI instead of DWI onto the anatomical scan.
